name: Diamond Drop - Match gems & jewel
description:
Diamond Drop is a magic match 3 puzzle game with brilliant jewels in over 300 dazzling puzzles. You will experience a magical journey filled with great excitement and brilliant visuals. Swap jewels to clear your way and dig into your own adventures.

●Play over hundreds of unique levels.
●Numerous boosters along the way to help you to dig into the magic and mystery diamond world.
●Create Crazy BOMBS by matching four or more jewels and blast the board!
●Beautiful and Brilliant Graphics.
●Unwrap delicious environments and meet the brilliant characters.
●Match jewel and collect all kinds of elements, not only jewels to win the level before you run out of moves.
●Daily events! Collect daily free coins of rewards.
●Fun and easy to play, but Challenging to fully master.
●Marvelous game modes include:
Stone – Match jewels next to the stone to break the stone and expand your jewel world
Green Lawn – Drop jewel into the green lawn to clean the dirty jewels
Jewelry Box – Match jewels next to the jewelry box to release the trapped Jewels
Ice – Match jewels to crush the ice
Flower – Feed the flower pot with candies to bloom the fragrant flowers

Download the Diamond Drop now and enjoy your fantastic and brilliant adventure!
developers: Bubble Go Ltd: Casual games for girls
publishers: Shanghai New Dragon Restaurant Management Co
